channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned traffic cone, 11th September
item.description:
It's not doing anything. Just sitting there on the pavement outside number 11. For weeks.

item.title: Extreme Extreme wet dog fouling on the pavement at the entrance to 83 Fernhead Road., 11th September

item.title: Dog fouling in sports cage, 11th September
item.description:
Fresh dog faeces in sports cage/children's play area and also further deposits on public footpath outside This is a persistent problem, could cctv be considered to catch/deter repeat offenders?

item.title: Outside 24 crossfield road, 11th September
item.description:
Previously case 8029694- i was notified saying this is fixed but nothing has been done and as a matter of fact the problem is worse. what was done to fix this? The bark is falling in my property and on my car and this is an issue. How will it be resolved and what is being done??
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Crossfield Road, Belsize Park, London

item.title: 2 bags of household rubbish left near waste bin at bus stop, 11th September
item.description:
The black sacks of rubbish were left and probably foxes opened them during the night. The rubbish (bottles, cardboard, plastics, food and containers) are blowing everywhere. I picked up a lot which had blown into my garden. This has happened many times since a litter bin was placed there. I would like to see it removed. It seems to encourage people to stop and leave their household rubbish next to it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harvey Road, Camberwell, London

item.title: There is a disability car with smashed windows and lights which has been abandoned since a week last Sunday (Black Vauxhall REG: LY23 XMH) parked in a parking bay outside of 29 Totnes Road, 11th September
item.description:
There is a disability car with all smashed windows, lights and wind mirrors which has been abandoned since a week last Sunday (Black Vauxhall REG: LY23 XMH) parked in a disabled parking bay outside of 29 Totnes Road- this vehicle is taxed until 1st July 2026 so I've advised Bexley wouldn't have an jurisdiction to remove this but resident reporting this is concerned that this that someone may set fire to this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Totnes Road, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
